name: He Comes Once
description:
A challenging first person survival horror experience set in rural America.

Get your stuff from the car, get back home alive, and keep an eye on the wind.

Story

You live off the grid in the Appalachian forests. It's late and you're just settling down to light a fire and relax. But dang, you forgot something in your car.

You don't remember where you parked the darn junker. Looks like you'll have to look around.

Get your stuff from your car and get back home.

Controls

  • WASD : Move
  • Shift : Run
  • Mouse : Look around
  • Right click : Focus
  • F12 : Screenshot

Mechanics

  • The location of the car is randomly chosen every time a new game is started.
  • You can hear the car engine, if you're close.
  • At all times, The Nameless One is following you.
  • The Nameless One is faster than you. When he touches you, he will kill you.
  • When The Nameless One is close you can hear various sounds; a clock ticking, whispering, etc.
  • The Nameless One carries with him a strong gust of wind, disturbing the trees even far away from him. Keep an eye on the trees to get a head start on running from him, and listen for unusual wind.
  • Sometimes The Nameless One will disappear and reappear somewhere else. Sometimes he will behave strangely. Do not fear him, just try to find your car. But do not let him catch you.
